AI Risk Managment Framework

Playbook

MAP

3 Benefits (3)

In this category, AI Actors will have contextually defined the cost (both monetary and otherwise) and benefits of the system beyond the status quo, so scope can be narrowed. At the end of this exercise, AI actors should have sufficient knowledge to identify system risks and other impacts.
